rootCauseSummary: Segment directives conflict: reconnect earliest at bucket 12 cannot satisfy maxIsolationBuckets=8 given fixed disconnect finish at bucket 2 (isolation would be >=10).

suggestedRepairsRanked.description: Increase maxIsolationBuckets to be compatible with earliest reconnect while keeping conservative reconnection delay.
Allow earlier reconnect (mission-safe only if verification can be accelerated).
